Name: High Mountain Roller Coaster VR
About the game: For generations, the High Mountain has preserved its reputation as one shrouded in mystery. Its origin remains unknown, its interiors remain unseen. The dreadful sierra holds many secrets bound to be unraveled by one brave, or rather, reckless adventurer. Thou, come forth and let the world know of treasures that no eye has ever set its sight on before. Exploration is nigh. High Mountain Roller Coaster VR is a trip into the very depths of the unknown. Prepare to see a world like no other in one of the most immersive roller coaster experiences in Virtual Reality to date. The tracks will be your guide, embrace their path and they will reward your curious eyes. FEATURES: Diverse environments - the High Mountain may seem as a snowy, cold, and desolate destination at first, however, its setting drastically shifts into a completely different one the further you advance. Powered by Unreal 4 - featuring UE4â€™s famous rendering system the High Mountain experience is the perfect opportunity to test out what Virtual Reality is truly capable of. Full HTC Vive and Oculus support - designed and developed to enable the immersive experience to both headset owners. You can always follow us on our social media for the latest updates.
